definitions.definition: The ancient name of the country between the range of the Hindu Kush and the Amu Darya in West Asia, encompassing parts of northern Afghanistan , eastern Turkmenistan , southern Uzbekistan , Tajikistan and northern Pakistan .

main_definition: The ancient name of the country between the range of the Hindu Kush and the Amu Darya in West Asia, encompassing parts of northern Afghanistan , eastern Turkmenistan , southern Uzbekistan , Tajikistan and northern Pakistan .
